caption.p: Average growth (cm 2) in bread for ( A) Penicillium and ( B) Aspergillus following treatment with dried aromatic plants after 7 days of storage. OD—oregano, TD—thyme, and SD—Satureja dry matter. Similar number superscripts (reported above each column) for the same plant are not significantly different ( p < 0.05) by Duncan’s multiple range test.
